description: Mobile techniques used by Skygofree, ATT&CK software S0327 v1.1
name: Skygofree (S0327)

techniques.comment: Skygofree has a capability to obtain files from other installed applications.
Skygofree can be controlled via binary SMS.
Skygofree can download executable code from the C2 server after the implant starts or after a specific command.
Skygofree has the capability to exploit several known vulnerabilities and escalate privileges.
Skygofree can record audio via the microphone when an infected device is in a specified location as well as record a video or capture a photo.
Skygofree can be controlled via HTTP, XMPP, FirebaseCloudMessaging, or GoogleCloudMessaging in older versions.
